text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ zum Gejag hat die Presse verlassen: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Petri de Vineis, Judicis Aulici & Cancellarii Friderici 1. Imp.</AUTHOR><TITLE>Epistolae</TITLE><VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT><PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Dissertation fur les Eaur & le Sel de Sedlitz en Boheme</TITLE><AUTHOR>Mr. Fred. Hoffmann, Medecin de Sa Maj. le Roy de Prusse</AUTHOR><NOTE>traduit du Latin</NOTE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT><PRIZE>6. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Projet de Histoire de Louis XIV.</TITLE><AUTHOR>Monsieur de la Hode.</AUTHOR><NOTE>enrichi de Medailles</NOTE><VOLUME>6. Vol.</VOLUME><FORMAT>4to</FORMAT><PRIZE>gratis</PRIZE><VOLUME>J. Tome</VOLUME><NOTE>est acheve</NOTE><VOLUME>Second</VOLUME><NOTE>est actuellement sous presse pour etre delivre sur la fin de Janvier prochain</NOTE></BIBL>So dann hat er von fremden Druck folgende Neuigkeiten empfangen:<BIBL><TITLE>Histoire de Stanislas I. Roy de Pologne Grand Duc de Lithuanie, Duc de Lorraine & de Bar &c. &c.</TITLE><VOLUME>2. Tomes</VOLUME><PRIZE>45. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Ungedruckte Venetianische und Turckische geheime Begebenheiten des Grafen von Bonneval, seit seiner Ankunfft in Venedig, bis auf die Zeit seiner Verweisung in die Insul Chio im Monath Mertz 1739.</TITLE><NOTE>aus dem Franzosischen des</NOTE><AUTHOR>Herrn von Mirone</AUTHOR><NOTE>uebersetzt</NOTE><VOLUME>2. Theilen</VOLUME><PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"1. Fixed malformed ampersands (&) to & in author and title fields. 2. Removed or replaced garbled unicode characters (e.g., \u0000a7, \u000020, \u0000bberfetzt, etc.) with correct text or omitted if not recoverable. 3. Added missing XML tags where text was outside of tags (e.g., 'traduit du Latin' as <NOTE>, 'enrichi de Medailles' as <NOTE>, 'gratis' as <PRIZE>, etc.). 4. Ensured each <BIBL> block is self-contained and all fields are within tags. 5. Added <NOTE> tags for descriptive or explanatory text. 6. Fixed inconsistent or missing closing tags. 7. Corrected 'Projet de HHistoire' to 'Projet de Histoire', 'Louis XIlV.' to 'Louis XIV.', and similar typos. 8. Added missing <AUTHOR> tags where author names were outside tags. 9. Added <NOTE> for 'aus dem Franzosischen des' and 'uebersetzt'. 10. Removed extraneous commas and semicolons outside of tags. 11. Standardized volume and tome references. 12. Cleaned up spacing and formatting for XML validity."}
